contextId.information: The prophets describe people whom Yahweh punished as drinking the punishment from Yahweh AT: "as I have punished you." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
Yahweh compares the houses of Jacob and Joseph to fire because they will destroy Esau like a fire that quickly and completely burns up straw. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: house of Jacob ... Joseph a flame
